data.title: Serena Williams Is Enjoying A Babymoon In Italy
data.meta_description: The 41-year-old tennis legend is on a babymoon with her growing family and enjoying the sights and sounds in Europe.
data.text:
Babymoons are a luxurious way for moms-to-be to relax before they give birth and everyone is indulging, including celebrities. Serena Williams is one of the latest to take herself and her unborn on a relaxing trip away from home. Williams, 41, recently enjoyed a getaway to Italy with her husband Alexis Ohanian and daughter Olympia.

We‚Äôve been getting all the vacation pictures from her tech bae, who shared a mirror selfie of the two seated at a dinner table via Instagram.

‚ÄúOOO: Took the fam on Babymoon 2 üì∏ She asked for a selfie so I took advantage of the mirror,‚Äù wrote the proud husband in a caption.

Ohanian, 40, also shared a full-circle moment in a subsequent post where he took his family to a museum he hasn‚Äôt visited in two decades.

‚ÄúShe said she wanted to see some art, so‚Ä¶

(Grazie, Uffizi, for letting me book an after hours private tour of some amazing works‚Ä¶ Michaelangelo‚Ä¶ Da Vinci‚Ä¶ Botticelli‚Ä¶ Caravaggio üò§ we all left inspired. Last time I visited was 20 years ago as a broke college student among 1,000s of visitors‚Äîthis was a surreal night),‚Äù his caption read.

The couple, who have been married since November 2017, will be welcoming their second child some time soon. They revealed the pregnancy during this year‚Äôs Met Gala in May. A few days before the public announcement, the parents told their daughter Olympia that she‚Äôd be a big sister. As you can guess, she was ecstatic about it.

‚ÄúOh, my God!‚Äù and ‚ÄúI‚Äôm so excited!‚Äù are a few ways she expressed that excitement in addition to doing gymnastics around the house.

Expanding her family was a reason Williams cited for retiring from tennis in 2022.

Prior to their fun in Italy, the family also stopped in Paris, where they saw the Eiffel Tower, rode some amusement park rides, ate crepes, rode on a boat and, Williams at least, saw Beyonc√©‚Äôs Renaissance Tour stop in the City of Lights.

Could this babymoon be a big tour of Europe? We‚Äôll have to wait and see! Whatever the trip, it‚Äôs some well deserved rest for the GOAT.
